description: Hit the trails running with the Olympus 5, our plushest trail runner, ready to tackle all terrain. Max cushion offers underfoot protection and comfort while their Original FootShape™ Fit gives your feet the space they need to sit naturally. With a breathable engineered mesh upper and a grippy outsole, you can keep enjoying the view all day.
name: Altra Olympus 5 - Mens

specs.value: Their signature FootShape™ comfort gives your feet more space to sit naturally and is designed to address biological differences in men's and women's feet
Balanced Cushioning™ platform positions your heel and forefoot at an equal distance from the ground, encouraging better alignment and better form
According to Vibram®, this high-performance sticky rubber offers unparalleled grip on both wet and dry surfaces, rugged longevity, and optimal ground adaptability
These canted lugs on the outsole are strategically placed beneath the metatarsals to provide added traction underfoot
These grid-like grooves in the midsole are designed to provide flexibility and movement
